title: Supply and Demand in Personal Finance
description: Understanding how supply and demand determine prices in markets and how to use market signals for smarter financial decisions in housing, labor markets, and consumer choices.
learning_objectives: Explain the law of demand and law of supply
Analyze how supply and demand curves determine market equilibrium prices
Identify factors that shift supply and demand in real markets
Predict how price changes affect markets relevant to personal finance
Apply supply and demand analysis to housing and labor markets

skill_builder.title: Market Analyzer
skill_builder.description: An interactive tool where students analyze supply and demand in housing and labor markets, predict price changes, evaluate market elasticity, and use price signals to make informed consumption and career choices.
